body: Btw ch 29 releases the 28th, this site is a bit behind for some reason

This is getting too crazy. What if the hypnosis wears off? What if the daughter goes to Jake and leaves him for Hypno? What is Jake gets angry and brings his friends to get her and finds out what is going on? Can Hypno do it to THAT many people?

Something to look forward to, would love some fatherxdaughter action going on here. Something tells me Jake might hop in as well. The MC is gonna have a whore house soon.
